turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order I would four small pizzas from Bella Luna Pizzeria with extra cheese and veggie lovers topping.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, do you want the veggies lovers for all 4?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I also want extra cheese. Yes, extra cheese on all four pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like to order anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so i have 4 small veggie lovers with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want this order to be a pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it will be $45 is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me see when your pizzas will be ready for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they will be ready in 30 minutes and you can also get your receipt in-store.
